holidays.title: Reward Yourself Day
holidays.description: Take a break, indulge in some self-care, and celebrate all the healthy habits you've kept up with!

holidays.title: Free Trade Day
holidays.description: Keep reading to learn the history and important facts about free trade and Free Trade Day.

holidays.title: Iris Day
holidays.description: We’re getting ready to stop and smell the irises on this fragrant holiday!

holidays.title: Jamestown Day
holidays.description: Take a day to reflect on colonialism, life in 17th century Virginia, and Native American cultures.

holidays.title: National Amyloidosis Day
holidays.description: Let us join hands and hearts in solidarity with the patients and families affected by amyloidosis.

holidays.title: National Animal Disaster Preparedness Day
holidays.description: Circumstances may compel you to act. Plan ahead of time for yourself and your beloved pets!

holidays.title: National Coconut Cream Pie Day
holidays.description: A day devoted to the ultimate custard-and-cream concoction.

holidays.title: National Dakota Day
holidays.description: Dakotas, are you ready to celebrate and be celebrated by the whole world?

holidays.title: National Give Someone a Cupcake Day
holidays.description: Get your frosting and toppings ready for National Give Someone a Cupcake Day!

holidays.title: National Have a Coke Day
holidays.description: If the very thought of Coke makes you want to break into song, you’re not alone.

holidays.title: National Maria Day
holidays.description: This National Maria Day, honor the 18th most popular name in the United States.

holidays.title: National Meeting Planners Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Time to make a plan for planners. Celebrate National Meeting Planners Appreciation Day with us!

holidays.title: National Nova Day
holidays.description: Nova is a unique name that deserves to be celebrated this National Nova Day!

holidays.title: National Report Government Contractor Fraud Day
holidays.description: Catching fraudsters, helping the government, saving taxpayers’ money — sounds like a real job!

holidays.title: National Student Nurse Day
holidays.description: Let’s get ready to celebrate the determination and achievements of student nurses.

holidays.title: National Women's Check-up Day
holidays.description: Celebrate National Women's Check-up Day by scheduling a checkup. It may just save your life.

holidays.title: National Women’s Checkup Day
holidays.description: Get checked and stay healthy if you’re a woman, on National Women's Checkup Day.

holidays.title: No Socks Day
holidays.description: Keep reading to find out who created No Socks Day and why!

holidays.title: Time of Remembrance and Reconciliation for those who Lost their Lives during WWII
holidays.description: We need to work through the past to understand the present and build the future.

holidays.title: Truman Day
holidays.description: Join us as we commemorate Harry S. Truman's birth and honor him!

holidays.title: Victory in Europe Day
holidays.description: Relive the Allies’ victory over Nazi Germany this Victory in Europe Day.

holidays.title: White Lotus Day
holidays.description: White Lotus Day celebrates theosophists and commemorates the death of the co-founder of the Theosophical Society.

holidays.title: World Donkey Day
holidays.description: Learn more about the strong, resilient, friendly, and helpful animal known as the donkey.

holidays.title: World Ovarian Cancer Day
holidays.description: Learn about ovarian cancer and its diagnosis with our article on World Ovarian Cancer Day.

holidays.title: World Red Cross and Red Crescent Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate the spirit of peace and honor the pathway of truces.

holidays.title: Enrique Iglesias’s Birthday
holidays.description: Iglesias occupies the number one spot on the Greatest of All Time Latin Artists chart.

holidays.title: Harry S. Truman’s Birthday
holidays.description: Harry S. Truman, the 33rd American president, presided over World War II.

holidays.title: Trisha Paytas’s Birthday
holidays.description: This celebrity Youtuber knows how best to get people's attention by just being herself!
